Text: Omi fʼilo kpe̩ kpʼeju-mi me̩;
Todu e̩wñ ma chʼukpe̩ e-O̩jo̩ kʼikwʼate̩?
I chʼuchobi ake̩re̩bʼame̩nuji n?
I ali o̩na o̩na-mi n?
Omi kpʼolemi ma kpe̩re̩,
je̩ ñw ma fʼumi ñwago oj e̩bo̩ o̩kpakpa,
E̩re̩-mi ma muna bʼo̩na te̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ omi ki fʼe̩wñ gbe̩, kʼe̩ne̩ omune̩ ki je̩;
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩wñʼka gwʼe̩do̩-mi o̩gwo̩ kʼu tene o̩ya one̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ o̩ya-mi ki no̩ e̩wñ tod e̩ne̩ omune̩,
Todu e-le̩ ma chʼudu e̩bie̩ne̩;
todu una ki afʼe̩wñ lie̩ gbogbo tʼef e̩kpabie̩ e-le̩ che,
Omi ma fʼeju kpʼo̩la adu-mi e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ bo,
mak abʼu nache e̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ kwane̩?
I chʼe̩ne̩ ki che mi efu iye-mi chʼowñ n?
Iche̩wñ kʼu fʼame̩nubie̩ ubi bʼe̩wñ ki dʼuma e̩do̩ te̩,
abe̩k omi kate gugu abu e̩wñ-mi je̩,
(o̩da, akwʼo̩jo̩ okolobia-mi i dʼugbo mi agba dabe̩ne̩ kʼu chʼata-wñ,
iche̩wñ kʼomi li e̩ne̩ du ki alenyo̩ tod ukpo kʼi ma ne̩ n,
iche̩wñ kʼago-wñ ma kadua ñw mi n,
iche̩wñ kʼomi chi o̩wo̩-mi nyʼate̩
mak e̩gbale̩ o̩papata ojika-mi kʼi ñwa bʼo̩ te̩,
Todu uchobi ki akwʼugbo O̩jo̩ chʼe̩wñ ubailo ñw mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼomi dʼo̩jamalia chʼukibeno-mi,
iche̩wñ kʼomi gwoguyo̩ ukpe̩ kʼu nʼe̩wñ nana tabale,
iche̩wñ kʼomi gʼolu e̩gba kʼi afu,
kʼe̩wñ le̩ gwʼe̩do̩-mi o̩gwo̩ maja maja,
e-le̩ ma ño̩ chʼudu kʼamakajo̩ abʼudu-wñ ñw mi,
Iche̩wñ kʼomi gwoguyo̩ abu ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ kʼi chulaka-mi kpabie̩,
(ochochi, omi je̩ ñw alu-mi dure
iche̩wñ kʼaboke̩le̩ unyabo-mi ma ka n, kakini,
(ilowa ru ojukpologu n;
i la chʼe̩wñ kʼu dʼechada-mi maja dab Ade̩m,
todabu kʼu railo o̩wo̩ amone̩ lile,
O, omi ma nʼe̩ne̩ʼka kʼi agbʼomu-mi!
Omi ma mʼu du nʼika-mi ale chuu;
U ma choli e̩re̩-mi kʼu chi ñw u;
Iche̩wñ kʼane̩ uche̩-mi kwa achagwunyu mi,
iche̩wñ kʼomi je̩ ura-wñ kʼu ma rʼo̩me̩ ñw u n,
mak ikeke ki tiga koji e̩wñ e̩yo,
